TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationConfiguration extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationConfiguration Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 設定 ASP.NET 應用程式以使用 表單強制回應性。

span.span: Configures an ASP.NET application to use the forms modality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一個方式來以程式設計方式存取和修改`forms`組態項目`authentication`一節。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `forms` element of a configuration `authentication` section. 此類型是包含群組的一部分，則，和型別。This type is part of a group that includes the ,the , and the types. 集合型別以外的類型會直接影響基礎的組態標記。The types other than the collection type directly affect the underlying configuration tags. > [!NOTE] > 可以將資訊寫入組態檔，根據 [區段] 屬性所定義的限制相關的區段的值是。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 在階層中不允許的層級的組態檔中寫入的任何嘗試會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取設定資訊在階層中任何層級。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. 如需安全性和延展性，建議您使用外部存放庫，例如資料庫、 維持使用者的認證。For safety and scalability, it is recommended that you use an external repository, such as a database, to keep the users' credentials. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. 您可以使用這個物件來存取其成員。You can use this object to access its members. 組態檔會包含類似下列的安裝程式。The configuration file will contain a setup similar to the following. **附註**如果您使用`credentials`區段中，一定要遵照所說明的指導方針[ASP.NET 驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。**Note** If you use the `credentials` section, be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 如需延展性和更佳的安全性，建議您使用外部資料庫，來儲存使用者的認證。For scalability and better security, it is recommended that you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 如需有關建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式會搜尋 Microsoft MSDN 網站 (msdn.microsoft.com) 為"保護 ASP.NET 應用程式 」 和 「 建置安全的 ASP.NET 應用程式： 驗證、 授權和安全通訊。 」For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Credentials As FormsAuthenticationCredentials

summary.span: 取得使用者名稱和密碼的 集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of user names and passwords.

value.span: 集合，此集合含有使用者名稱和密碼。

span.span: A collection that contains the user names and passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得使用者名稱和密碼，才能在表單型驗證時使用。The property gets the user names and passwords to use during forms-based authentication. > [!NOTE] > 需要安全性時，您應該使用替代方式來儲存使用者名稱和密碼;例如，在資料庫中儲存。When security is required, you should use alternative ways of storing the user names and passwords; for example, in a database store. 如果您決定要使用此集合，您應該使用提供的加密功能。If you decide to use this collection, you should use the provided encryption facility. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. summary.span: 取得或設定要以表單驗證 Cookie 傳送的網域名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the domain name to be sent with forms authentication cookies.

value.span: 外送表單驗證 Cookie 的網域名稱。

span.span: The name of the domain for the outgoing forms authentication cookies.

value.span: 預設值為空字串。

span.span: Default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用於驗證 cookie。The is used for the authentication cookies. 此屬性的值會對應。This property corresponds to the value of . 這項設定將會優先於`domain`之區域的表單驗證 cookie 的屬性。This setting will take precedence over the `domain` attribute of the section for forms authentication cookies. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EnableCrossAppRedirects { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.EnableCrossAppRedirects : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出已驗證使用者是否能重新導向至其他應用程式中的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether authenticated users can be redirected to URLS in other applications.

value.span: 如果已驗證使用者能夠重新導向至其他應用程式中的 URL 則為 true，否則為 false。

span.span: true if authenticated users can be redirected to URLs in other applications; otherwise false.

value.span: 預設為 false。

span.span: The default is false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值設定的 enableCrossAppRedirects 屬性`forms`[驗證] 區段中的組態區段。The property value sets the enableCrossAppRedirects attribute of the `forms` section in the authentication section of a configuration. 藉由檢查屬性方法時重新導向至不在目前的應用程式的 URL。The property is checked by the method when the redirection is to a URL that is not in the current application. 如果為 true，然後執行重新導向，否則瀏覽器重新導向至網頁中定義屬性。If is true, then the redirect is performed; otherwise the browser is redirected to the page defined in the property. > [!NOTE] > 執行時重新導向所有應用程式，您必須確定有幾個中的屬性`form`重複的已驗證的應用程式間的組態區段。When performing redirects across applications, you must ensure that several of the attributes in the `form` configuration section are duplicated across the authenticated applications. 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱 < [Forms 應用程式之間的驗證](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7)。For more information and an example, see [Forms Authentication Across Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/99e2f9e8-5b97-4a4d-a4ed-5f93276053b7). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#8)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要求的重新導向 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the redirection URL for the request.

value.span: 當使用者未獲得驗證時，將要求重新導向到的 URL。

span.span: The URL the request is redirected to when the user is not authenticated.

value.span: 預設值為 login.aspx。

span.span: The default value is login.aspx.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求未經驗證使用者時，或沒有有效的驗證 cookie 時存在，屬性會指定重新導向 URL。The property specifies the redirection URL for the request when the user is not authenticated or when no valid authentication cookie exists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取。The following code example shows how to access the . 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. summary.span: 取得或設定 Cookie 路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie path.

value.span: 要用於驗證之 HTTP Cookie 的路徑。

span.span: The path of the HTTP cookie to use for authentication.

value.span: 預設值是正斜線 (/)，表示 Web 應用程式的根目錄。

span.span: The default value is a slash (/), which represents the Web-application root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出驗證 cookie 所在的位置，而且傳輸以及驗證 cookie 本身。The property indicates where the authentication cookie resides and is transmitted along with the authentication cookie itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. span.span: Gets or sets the encryption type used to encrypt the cookie.

value.span: 其中一個 列舉值。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

value.span: 預設值是 。

span.span: The default value is .

value.span: **請注意**務必使用這個屬性的預設值，如果您希望資料驗證和加密來協助保護 cookie。

span.span: **Note** Be sure to use the default value for this property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie.

value.span: 這個選項會根據 使用已設定的資料驗證演算法。

span.span: This option uses the configured data-validation algorithm based on the .

value.span: 如果可以使用三重 DES (3DES)，且金鑰長度至少是 48 個位元組，則三重 DES (3DES) 會用於加密。

span.span: Triple-DES (3DES) is used for encryption, if available and if the key is long enough (48 bytes or more).

value.span: 若要提高 Cookie 的保護等級，您也可以將 設定為 。

span.span: To improve the protection of your cookie, you may also want to set the to .

[!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RequireSSL : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出在傳輸驗證資訊時是否需要 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 連線。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection is required when transmitting authentication information.

value.span: 如果需要 SSL 連接則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is required; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`，Web 應用程式會拒絕不使用 SSL 連線的所有表單驗證要求。If is `true`, a Web application rejects all the forms authentication requests that do not use an SSL connection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。The following code example shows how to access the property Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SlidingExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證滑動期限。

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication sliding expiration.

value.span: 如果啟用滑動期限則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the sliding expiration is enabled; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設為`true`、 到期日會重設期間驗證 cookie 為有效的間隔時間屬性值。When the is set to `true`, the time interval during which the authentication cookie is valid is reset to the expiration property value. 會發生這種情況是如果在逾時時間到期之後，在使用者瀏覽。This happens if the user browses after half of the timeout has expired. 例如，如果您使用滑動期限來設定到期的 20 分鐘的時間，使用者可以瀏覽網站，在下午 2:00，並接收設定為在下午 2:20 過期的 cookie。For example, if you set an expiration of 20 minutes by using sliding expiration, a user can visit the site at 2:00 PM and receive a cookie that is set to expire at 2:20 PM. 如果使用者瀏覽網站，在下午 2:10 之後，才會更新到期日。The expiration is only updated if the user visits the site after 2:10 PM. 如果在下午 2:09 使用者瀏覽的網站，因為未跳過到期時間的一半，將不會更新的 cookie。If the user visits the site at 2:09 PM, the cookie is not updated because half of the expiration time has not passed. 如果使用者再等候 12 分鐘的時間，下午 2:21 瀏覽的網站，將過期的 cookie。If the user then waits 12 minutes, visiting the site at 2:21 PM, the cookie will be expired. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取 屬性。The following code example shows how to access the property. 中的程式碼範例，請參閱類別主題，以了解如何取得一節。Refer to the code example in the class topic to learn how to get the section. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/CS/formsauthenticationconfiguration.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.FormsAuthenticationConfiguration/VB/formsauthenticationconfiguration.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode TicketCompatibilityMode { System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::TicketCompatibilityMode value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示要使用 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 或當地時間做為票證到期日。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to use Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or local time for the ticket expiration date.

value.span: 票證到期日相容模式。

span.span: The ticket expiration-date compatibility mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是當地時間，以列舉值。The default value is local time as expressed by the enumeration value. ## Examples [驗證 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的 forms 項目forms Element for authentication (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8163b8b5-ea6c-46c8-b5a9-c4c3de31c0b3)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Timeout : TimeSpan with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the authentication time-out.

value.span: 驗證到期之前的時間 (以分鐘為單位)。

span.span: The amount of time in minutes after which the authentication expires.

value.span: 預設值為 30 分鐘。

span.span: The default value is 30 minutes.
